download ^

I decided to design a atmospheric glider,this was my 1st real attempt at anything from the space plane hangar but as the update improved things i decided to give 1 a go and ended up with something a bit more than planned, but i was suggested to upload it as its very manoeuvrable and has silly gliding and turning capabilities

it wont go much higher than 15k

it wont go much faster than 1500

takes off at 35 and can go into a straight vertical climb

landing at slower than 50 is advised

can glide stable and still be very manoeuvrable at very low speeds and can also use the bug to gain speed with the engine off

turning circles are sharp enough to do stunts in the mountains and around the buildings

if you do download it you will need to use infinite fuel as to avoid mass to lift ratios changing and it acting more like a piece of paper in the wind :-)

sas is not needed, however it makes life far easier if you are not great at flying it does however decrease the performance of the plane a small amount. i tend to toggle it depending on what i am doing

im sure there are far better examples made, but sharing is caring
